h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Earth Wolf
content: Since they’re all gone, head through the gate the archers were guarding and stick to the right side to find a path up to a chest, which you can loot to get 1 **Small Piece of Gold** and 3 **Tiny Piece of Gold**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Earth Wolf'.
The content is as follows:
Since they’re all gone, head through the gate the archers were guarding and stick to the right side to find a path up to a chest, which you can loot to get 1 **Small Piece of Gold** and 3 **Tiny Piece of Gold**.
